combined_text: Today, Celine Dion’s management team and her record label, Sony Music Entertainment Canada Inc., became aware of the unauthorized usage of the video, recording, musical performance, and likeness of Celine Dion singing “My Heart Will Go On” at a Donald Trump / JD Vance campaign I’m honored to have performed tonight, for the Paris 2024 Opening Ceremony, and so full of joy to be back in one of my very favorite cities! Most of all, I’m so happy to be celebrating these amazing athletes, with all their stories of sacrifice and determination, pain and Wow, what a night. Thanks to everyone at Paris2024 , Olympics and Dior who helped make this dream come true. And now, it’s already time to go! I will miss you Paris! - Celine xx… PC : Dee Amore Let the games begin!Sending love and luck to all competitors. - Celine xx… Adele, we are so grateful to you for welcoming me and my family back to the Colosseum for your amazing show! summary: Celine Dion's manager and record label discovered the unauthorized use of her song "My Heart Will Go On" on behalf of Donald Trump/John McCain, and is now under investigation by police.
